Name: Hidden Childhood
Description: You come across kids playing hide-and-seek. They promise you their “treasure” if you can find all of them within the time limit…
QuestDesc: You come across kids playing hide-and-seek. They promise you their “treasure” if you can find all of them within the time limit…

Dialogues.Speaker: Pippi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You all promised me! I'm not going to be "it" this time! I'm always running around... and Celo's always the last one left!

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, okay. Then this time, how about Jode...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jode
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No! Not me! Celo, you always hide where no one can ever find you. Like how last time you hid in a trash bag filled with actual garbage...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jode
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A normal person would never even think to look there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: C'mon, I'm just trying to make the game more exciting...

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lemme think... Hey, {Male=mister;Female=lady}. Yes, you. I think you'd be the perfect "it"!

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ohhh, that's not what I meant. I meant that... you're a tall {Male=guy;Female=lady}, which means you can see really far.

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You've got brains and a good pair of eyes. Wouldn't these perks make you the perfect person to be "it"?

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What do you say, {Male=mister;Female=lady}? Wanna join us for an exciting game of hide-and-seek?

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you can find all of us, you'll even get treasure...

Options.PlotLineKey: Can I see the treasure first?
The three of you aren't trying to prank me, are you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sure... No, wait. The whole point of the treasure is to give you a huge surprise when you get it. I don't want to spoil it for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Before we start, let's go over the rules first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We would never. This is a fair game. But before we start, let's go over the rules first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's simple: Find everyone in the game area before the time runs out, and you'll win!

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, yeah. Here's a little tip for being "it," {Male=mister;Female=lady}...

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The person who's "it" has to think about where they should seek, and also guess where others might hide.

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you ready, {Male=mister;Female=lady}? The game lasts for five minutes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ready, {Male=mister;Female=lady}? ... We'll start a five-minute countdown.

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hee-hee, we won! Well, what do you think? Even a grown-up can't catch us!

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's a secret. When you win, you'll know. Wanna play again, {Male=mister;Female=lady}?

Dialogues.Speaker: Celo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ready, {Male=mister;Female=lady}? ... We'll start a five-minute countdown.
